TITLE: Warren Buffett’s shopping extravaganza kicks off with Squishmallows pit, 'Poor Charlie’s Almanack'
SUMMARY: The Oracle of Omaha's annual event kicked off with wares from See's Candies to the latest Squishmallows of Warren Buffett and Charlie Munger.

TITLE: Berkshire Hathaway’s big mystery stock wager could be revealed soon
SUMMARY: Warren Buffett's bet, shrouded in mystery, has captivated Berkshire Hathaway investors since first appearing in disclosures late last year.

TITLE: Talent war between family offices and Wall Street drives up salaries
SUMMARY: Wealthy families are spending an average of $3 million to run their family offices, according to a J.P. Morgan Private report, and the biggest cost is staffing.

TITLE: First Berkshire Hathaway annual meeting without Charlie Munger: What to expect from Warren Buffett
SUMMARY: The absence of Charlie Munger will be on everyone's mind when Berkshire Hathaway's annual shareholder meeting kicks off Saturday in Omaha.

TITLE: 'Trader justice': Ex-SocGen trader fired for risky bets claims he was made a 'scapegoat'
SUMMARY: A former Societe Generale trader who was fired for unauthorized risky bets has lambasted the French bank for making him a "scapegoat."

TITLE: China's automakers must adapt quickly or lose out on the EV boom in the face of regulatory scrutiny abroad and competition at home
SUMMARY: Adoption of battery and hybrid-powered cars has surged in China, but an onslaught of new models has fueled a price war, while regulatory scrutiny grows abroad.

TITLE: Here's what changed in the new Fed statement
SUMMARY: This is a comparison of Wednesday's Federal Open Market Committee statement with the one issued after the Fed's previous policymaking meeting in March.

TITLE: Fed keeps rates steady as it notes 'lack of further progress' on inflation
SUMMARY: With the decision to hold the line on rates, the committee noted a "lack of further progress" in getting inflation back down to the central bank's 2% target.

TITLE: Why hundreds of U.S. banks may be at risk of failure
SUMMARY: Of about 4,000 banks, 282 banks face threats from commercial real estate and higher interest rates, according to a study by Klaros Group.

TITLE: NYCB shares jump 30% after CEO gives two-year plan for 'clear path to profitability'
SUMMARY: CEO Joseph Otting took over NYCB in April after an investor group led by former Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin injected more than $1 billion into the lender.

TITLE: Bitcoin extends its slide to start May, falling to $57,000 as Fed leaves rates unchanged
SUMMARY: Bitcoin slid to its lowest level in over two months to kick off May, as the Federal Reserve held interest rates steady.

TITLE: New Calamos ETF promises ‘100% downside protection.’ Here's how it works
SUMMARY: “There’s no tricks. There’s no magic. This is the secret sauce,” Calamos Investments’ Matt Kaufman said.

TITLE: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Amazon, Starbucks, Pinterest, Advanced Micro Devices and more
SUMMARY: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

TITLE: This is the level where the 10-year Treasury yield becomes a 'clear problem' for stocks, Goldman study shows
SUMMARY: Goldman said that when the 10-year Treasury yield hits 5%, the correlation between bond yields and stocks turns negative.

TITLE: HSBC beats expectations in first-quarter earnings; CEO Noel Quinn to retire
SUMMARY: The company also announced the surprise retirement of Group Chief Executive Officer Noel Quinn.

TITLE: Musk makes surprise visit to Beijing as Tesla's China-made cars pass data security rules
SUMMARY: Local authorities removed restrictions on Tesla cars after the company passed China's data security requirements, the automaker said Sunday.

TITLE: ‘This is a unique time’: ARK Invest’s chief futurist tackles tech innovation from AI to robotics
SUMMARY: ARK Invest's chief futurist Brett Winton lists five groups in the heart of tech innovation.

TITLE: Miami is 'ground zero' for climate risk. People are moving to the area and building there anyway
SUMMARY: Miami is undergoing a boom despite a high vulnerability to sea level rise, floods and more intense storms. Residents may face financial hardship.

TITLE: Trump advisors are considering plans to dramatically revamp the Fed, WSJ report says
SUMMARY: Trump's political operatives are putting together a plan that would give him unprecedented influence over the Fed, the report states.

TITLE: Chinese EV start-ups Nio and Xpeng turn to the mass market for growth
SUMMARY: Chinese electric car start-ups Nio and Xpeng are turning to a lower-priced segment of the market with plans to release newly-branded cars this year.

TITLE: Why ARK Invest thinks it’s an 'amazing time' to invest in cutting-edge tech
SUMMARY: ARK Invest's Brett Winston is betting big on private tech companies for long-term gains.

TITLE: Dow closes lower by more than 370 points as inflation, growth worries resurface: Live updates
SUMMARY: Stocks fell Thursday after the latest U.S. economic data showed a sharp slowdown in growth and pointed to persistent inflation.

TITLE: Barclays shares up 6% as bank swings back to profit in first quarter amid strategic overhaul
SUMMARY: Barclays on Thursday reported first-quarter net income of £1.55 billion ($1.93 billion), beating expectations and returning the British lender to profit amid a major strategic overhaul.

TITLE: Nvidia-backed startup Synthesia unveils AI avatars that can convey human emotions
SUMMARY: AI startup Synthesia on Thursday announced the launch of its "Expressive Avatars," AI-generated digital avatars that can convey human emotions.

TITLE: Deutsche Bank shares up 8% after first-quarter profit beat, investment banking recovery
SUMMARY: Deutsche Bank reported first-quarter earnings on Thursday.

TITLE: Nvidia supplier SK Hynix reverses losses in first quarter on explosive AI demand
SUMMARY: This comes after SK Hynix posted net losses for five consecutive quarters from a slump in the memory chip market.

TITLE: JPMorgan Chase is caught in U.S-Russia sanctions war after overseas court orders $440 million seized from bank
SUMMARY: The escalation shows how American banks are struggling to navigate American sanctions rules more than two years after Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

TITLE: Klarna scores major payment deal with Uber ahead of hotly anticipated IPO
SUMMARY: The global deal will see Klarna added as a payment option on the Uber and Uber Eats apps in the U.S., Germany and Sweden.

TITLE: U.S. prosecutors seek 36-month sentence for ex-Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao
SUMMARY: U.S. prosecutors on Tuesday recommended an above-guidance, 36-month sentence for former Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao.

TITLE: China may have to brace for a new wave of bond defaults, S&P says
SUMMARY: China might see a new wave of bond defaults as soon as next year — the third round in about a decade, according to an S&P Global Ratings report released Tuesday.
